channel.title: [release] tutorial island
channel.description:
Here it is. Sorry for the 4 hour delay :eek:
[IMG]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac219/roflcopter_2010/island.png[/img] Don't worry the pink's just the landscape editor it'll look fine ingame
Yes you will see it's only the land and walls. No trees, people or objects I'll make a version 2.0 with the trees, people and objects [code] List of things to do: Add trees Add doors Add people Add objects Add npc handlers Add the teleport to lumby Add the spelling errors into the npc handlers [/code] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SRFR9NZP
Mirror: http://www.rscangel.org/files/tut_island.zip You'll need winrar [b]IMPORTANT[/b] The password for the rar is: [code]myroflcoptergoessoisoisoi[/code]
If the link goes dead pm me.
If you get it running with everything on it with the people and stuff into it post here. I'd love to see what you did with it
And also if you'd like the nice 3d landscape editor i used (not made by me) http://upit.cc/files/6f723ce3f66f57d7d89862026294a7dd.zip
Instructions to get it into your landscape.rscd/.data [code] I would recommend turning your landscape.rscd/.data to landscape.rar (DO NOT UNRAR IT) edit your tutorial island as you wish and drag it into the landscape.rar and change the landscape.rar into landscape.rscd/.data If you are using easyrsc put it client and server side [/code]

item.title: [release] tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

RSCShadow:

You can’t add trees/npcs with the landscape editor, incase you didn’t know.

Yes you can if you have skills to modify the landscape editor to do that.
I have made it, and it is NOT hard.

Read full topic

item.title: [release] tutorial island
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

Here it is. Sorry for the 4 hour delay :eek:

island.png773×490

Don’t worry the pink’s just the landscape editor it’ll look fine ingame

Yes you will see it’s only the land and walls. No trees, people or objects
I’ll make a version 2.0 with the trees, people and objects

List of things to do:
Add trees
Add doors
Add people
Add objects
Add npc handlers
Add the teleport to lumby 
Add the spelling errors into the npc handlers

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SRFR9NZP

Mirror: http://www.rscangel.org/files/tut_island.zip
You’ll need winrar
IMPORTANT The password for the rar is:

myroflcoptergoessoisoisoi

If the link goes dead pm me.

If you get it running with everything on it with the people and stuff into it post here. I’d love to see what you did with it

And also if you’d like the nice 3d landscape editor i used (not made by me)
http://upit.cc/files/6f723ce3f66f57d7d89862026294a7dd.zip

Instructions to get it into your landscape.rscd/.data

I would recommend turning your landscape.rscd/.data to landscape.rar (DO NOT UNRAR IT) edit your tutorial island as you wish and drag it into the landscape.rar and change the landscape.rar into landscape.rscd/.data If you are using easyrsc put it client and server side

Read full topic
